Input.Description: Filter true flag -> Sum w/ mapping

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE SUM(root["Number"]) FROM root WHERE root["Flag"]

Input.Description: Filter false flag -> Sum w/ mapping

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE SUM(root["Number"]) FROM root WHERE (NOT root["Flag"])

Input.Description: Skip -> Take -> SelectMany(Select) -> Skip -> Take -> Sum

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE SUM(r1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE c0["Grade"] FROM ( SELECT VALUE root FROM root OFFSET 5 LIMIT 5 ) AS r0 JOIN c0 IN r0["Children"] OFFSET 10 LIMIT 20 ) AS r1

Input.Expression: query.Skip(1).Take(20).Select(f => new AnonymousType(v0 = f.Children.Skip(1).Select(c => c.Grade).Sum(), v1 = f.Children.Skip(1).Take(3).Select(c => c.Grade).Sum(), v2 = f.Children.Take(3).Skip(1).Select(c => c.Grade).Sum(), v3 = f.Records.Transactions.Select(t => t.Amount).OrderBy(a => a).Skip(10).Take(20).Sum(), v4 = f.Children.Where(c => (c.Grade > 20)).OrderBy(c => c.Grade).Select(c => c.Grade).Skip(1).Sum())).Skip(1).Take(10).Select(f => (((f.v0 + f.v1) + f.v2) + f.v4)).Sum(), Object)

Output.SqlQuery: SELECT VALUE SUM(r8) FROM ( SELECT VALUE (((r7["v0"] + r7["v1"]) + r7["v2"]) + r7["v4"]) FROM ( SELECT VALUE {"v0": v5, "v1": v10, "v2": v15, "v3": v19, "v4": v22} FROM root JOIN ( SELECT VALUE SUM(r0) FROM ( SELECT VALUE v2["Grade"] FROM root JOIN v2 IN root["Children"] OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2147483647 ) AS r0 ) AS v5 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE SUM(r1) FROM ( SELECT VALUE v6["Grade"] FROM root JOIN v6 IN root["Children"] OFFSET 1 LIMIT 3 ) AS r1 ) AS v10 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE SUM(r3) FROM ( SELECT VALUE r2["Grade"] FROM ( SELECT TOP 3 VALUE v11 FROM root JOIN v11 IN root["Children"] ) AS r2 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2147483647 ) AS r3 ) AS v15 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE SUM(r5) FROM ( SELECT VALUE t0["Amount"] FROM root JOIN t0 IN root["Records"]["Transactions"] ORDER BY t0["Amount"] ASC OFFSET 10 LIMIT 20 ) AS r5 ) AS v19 JOIN ( SELECT VALUE SUM(r6) FROM ( SELECT VALUE c0["Grade"] FROM root JOIN c0 IN root["Children"] WHERE (c0["Grade"] > 20) ORDER BY c0["Grade"] ASC OFFSET 1 LIMIT 2147483647 ) AS r6 ) AS v22 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 20 ) AS r7 OFFSET 1 LIMIT 10 ) AS r8
